code: import React from'react';import{useTheme}from'./ThemeContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(_ref){let{title,children,icon}=_ref;const{colors}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:colors.cardBg,padding:'25px',borderRadius:'12px',border:`2px solid ${colors.border}`,boxShadow:`0 4px 15px ${colors.shadow}`,transition:'all 0.3s ease',cursor:'pointer'},onMouseOver:e=>{e.currentTarget.style.transform='translateY(-5px)';e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow=`0 8px 25px ${colors.shadow}`;},onMouseOut:e=>{e.currentTarget.style.transform='translateY(0)';e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow=`0 4px 15px ${colors.shadow}`;},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',marginBottom:'15px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontSize:'2rem',marginRight:'10px'},children:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:colors.text,margin:0,fontSize:'1.3rem',fontWeight:'bold'},children:title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:colors.textSecondary,lineHeight:'1.6'},children:children})]});}export default Card;
